questions.question: If the substance is legal, then it is safe to use

choices.answer: If a substance is legal, then it is definitely safe to use
It is only safe for people over the age of 21 to use

When used under supervision, it is safe to use any substance

All of these

questions.question: People do not get addicted to a drug as long as they only use it one time     (T/F)

choices.answer: TRUE- you can stop any time you want
FALSE-drugs like meth & heroin, can be immediately addictive
TRUE- there are no drugs that cause immediate addiction
FALSE- lab rats get addicted on the first use
